### Overview

::: {.justify}
In this exploratory data analysis (EDA), we examine the time series data sets discussed in the [Data Visualization](https://mazuckerberg.georgetown.domains/DSAN_5600/4_data_visualization.html) section. The goal is to gain insight into the underlying components of the multiple time series. These analyses include trends, seasonality, variations, and periodic fluctuations. In addition, we will evaluate the time series for decomposition to see if it can be identified as multiplicative or additive. We will analyze the data sets using the following time series plots and tools:  Lag plots, autocorrelation function (ACF) and partial autocorrelation function (PACF) analysis, and stationarity checks using the Augmented Dickey-Fuller test. 

:::

#### Global Oil Production

::: {.justify}
The following plot, shows the data for the top 15 oil-producing countries in 2022. The goal is to use a line plot to show the evolution of the global oil market over the last 22 years and identify the dynamic leaders. Throughout this project, our central focus will be on the United States, which has been the leading country in oil production since 2018.
:::
